text: Scotts is a modern dansband from Lidköping, Sweden.Discogs Established in 1992, Scotts competed at Dansbandskampen in 2008, finishing up second behind Larz-Kristerz, starting to aim at their ambition becoming a full-time band. The band also competed at Melodifestivalen in 2009, with the song "Jag tror på oss".Scotts, AllMusic ==Members== *Henrik Strömberg - Vocal, guitar *Roberto Mårdstam - bass *Claes Linder - keyboard *Per-Erik "Lillen" Tagesson - drums ==Discography== ===Albums=== Title Release Om det känns rätt 1992 På vårt sätt 2008 Upp till dans 2009 Längtan 2009 Vi gör det igen 2010 ===Singles=== Title Release En blick, en dans, en kyss (One Dance, One Rose, One Kiss) 2001 Du 2004 Big Boys'n Pink Ladies 2006 Om igen 2008 Jag tror på oss 2009 ===DVD=== Title Release På väg till Malung med Scotts 2010 ==Svensktoppen songs== *"Cassandra" - 1999 *"Marias kärlek" - 2001 *"En blick, en dans, en kyss" (One Dance, One Rose, One Kiss) - 2001 *"Om igen" - 2009 *"Underbar" - 2009 *"Jag ångrar ingenting" - 2010 ===Missade svensktoppslistan=== *"Leker med elden" - 2002 *"Jag tror på oss"- 2009 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Dansbands Category:1992 establishments in Europe Category:Swedish musical groups Category:1990s establishments in Sweden
title: Scotts (band)
